tool_description: Makes final moderation decisions based on content severity analysis, applying platform policies and determining appropriate actions.

risk_level.description: Risk level: low, moderate, high, or extreme

content_type.description: Type of content: image, video, or audio

platform_policy.description: Platform policy setting: strict, standard, or lenient

user_context.description: User context: public, restricted, or private

primary_concerns.description: Primary safety concerns from severity analysis

human_review_threshold.description: Confidence threshold below which human review is required

error_messages: Invalid severity score: severity_score must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid risk level: Use one of [low, moderate, high, extreme].
Invalid content type: Use one of [image, video, audio].
Invalid platform policy: Use one of [strict, standard, lenient].
Invalid user context: Use one of [public, restricted, private].
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Decision processing failed: Could not generate moderation decision.
usage: Provide severity analysis results including severity_score, risk_level, content_type, platform_policy, primary_concerns, and confidence_level. Configure review thresholds and context as needed.

moderation_action.description: Final moderation action: approve, flag, remove, or review

content_warnings.description: Content warnings to display if approved with restrictions

appeal_eligible.description: Whether the decision is eligible for appeal

escalation_priority.description: Priority level for escalation: low, normal, high, urgent
